content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, James. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was expecting a monthly rent of around €500 to €600. However, I am open to negotiation and willing to consider any reasonable offers. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to propose a rental price of €450 per month.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your proposal, James. While I appreciate your offer, I am afraid that I cannot accept it at this time. The apartment is in a prime location and I believe it is worth more than €450 per month. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a rental price in the range of €550 to €600 per month. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate, but I have to stick to my budget. Would it be possible to reduce the rental price to €475 per month?

I am also willing to sign a longer lease agreement if that would help in reducing the rental price.

Also, I am willing to provide references to prove my reliability and responsibility.

I am looking for a good relationship with my landlord and I would like to make sure that we can both be satisfied with the rental agreement.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, James. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to provide references to prove your reliability. I understand your budget constraints and I am willing to consider a longer lease agreement if it would help in reducing the rental price. However, I am still looking for a rental price in the range of €550 to €600 per month. I believe that this is a fair price for the apartment's location and size. Is there any room for further negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine
